name: Vacuum Voyager
description:
Experience intense, fast-paced arcade action as you manoeuvre your ship through a hazardous asteroid field, expertly avoiding incoming threats with your space vacuum technology.

Suck up colourful chunks of debris and smash asteroids together to gather even more resources to fuel your ship!

How to play
  1. Collect space debris to fuel your ship.
  2. Avoid colliding with asteroids which damage your ship.
  3. Use your vacuum to suck and smash asteroids into each other in order to get rewarded with big bursts of debris.
Controls

Use the mouse to steer your ship and influence the movement of the spaceship. 

Planned Content
  • Highscores
  • Powerups
  • Achievements
  • Alternative game modes (such as Blitz - 60 seconds to score as high as possible)
  • Music & Additional SFX
  • Improved UI and Menu
Credits
